org.spf4j.avro.calcite

Class AbstractAvroTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.avro.calcite.AbstractAvroTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.calcite.schema.Table
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvroDataSetAsProjectableFilterableTable, AvroFilterableTable, AvroIteratorAsProjectableFilterableTable

    public abstract class AbstractAvroTable
extends Object
implements org.apache.calcite.schema.Table
    Implementation that will scan a stream of avro objects. will need to review if QueriableTable is something that fits the bill. https://www.programcreek.com/java-api-examples/?code=vlsi/mat-calcite-plugin/ mat-calcite-plugin-master/MatCalcitePlugin/src/com/github/vlsi/mat/calcite/functions/TableFunctions.java
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas
